Note: Cf. 5482, 3359 and Pricke of Conscience, lines 2892.
Title(s): ‘How to escape the pains of Purgatory’
_description: ‘How to escape the pains of Purgatory’, by Iohannes Mydwyntyr — twenty-nine lines in couplets

BLHar2383.First Lines:
MAn þenke here on ofte tymeWhat helpuþ sowles yn
                    purgatoryes pyne…
BLHar2383.Last Lines:
…Graunte vs in heuen blisse to see hys suete faceÞat hyt
                    so be amen amen pur charyte
BLHar2383.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Middle English Poems by Mydwynter.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         64 (1949): 454-61: 459-60.
